**In plain language**

* Finds **≈9 of 10** fish in a frame  
* **Rarely** confuses coral/rocks for fish  
* Slide the confidence slider → right to cut *false positives*  
  (you’ll skip a few shy fish)

---

**Key numbers**

| Metric    | Value | What it means |
|-----------|------:|---------------|
| Precision | **0.885** | Share of detections that are real fish |
| Recall    | **0.861** | Share of all fish that are found        |
| mAP@0.5   | **0.937** | Combined quality score                  |

---

**Tune the confidence threshold**

| 0.20 | 0.50 *(default)* | 0.80 |
|------|------------------|------|
| Catch *everything* | Balanced | Only sure hits |

> “*All models are wrong, some are useful.*”

Trained on expert-labelled images – humans **and** models make mistakes.  
Use results as a helpful **preview**, not the final answer.
